comments.body:
Only this test need to set shape, so I don't `set_shape` for other tests. 
I have run all test scripts at local, and I think they would pass the **ci test** this time.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +273,277 @@      v1 = gen_state_ops._variable(shape=[1], dtype=tf.float32, 
          name="v1", container="", shared_name="")
      v1.set_shape([1])
    tensor2 = v0 + v1
    ema = tf.train.ExponentialMovingAverage(0.25, name="foo_avg")
